metadata.title: Best of Simon & Garfunkel
description: First they went platinum.Now they're going green. Your best loved music in its simplest form. 20 best-selling "Greatest Hits" & "Best of" collections now available in a new eco-friendly package. 1CD in card wallet packaging - no plastic, no booklet - just great music! Booklets are available online through a unique URL on the package.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "5.5 x 0.5 x 5 inches; 8 Ounces", "Manufacturer": "Slider Pack", "Date First Available": "March 7, 2008", "Label": "Slider Pack", "Number of discs": "1"}
